hero.subtitle: We are a leading employment and recruitment agency specializing in the legal employment of foreigners in Europe. We connect talented workers from Asia, Africa, and America with top companies across the European Union. We help with obtaining residence cards, work visas, and work permits. Our agency was created for people seeking new career opportunities tailored to their qualifications and aspirations.

features.feature1_desc: Every candidate is unique to us. We analyze your skills and expectations to find the perfect position.
features.feature2_desc: We have been operating for years, enjoying the trust of hundreds of employees and employers. We focus on transparency and professionalism.
features.feature3_desc: We provide full support at every stage - from recruitment, through formalities, to accommodation and on-site support.

quality.title: Quality and Security Guarantee
quality.desc: Our many years of experience, during which we have repeatedly faced crisis situations, has allowed us to develop a system in which the employee has a guarantee of employment with a proven employer, and on the other hand, the employer has a guarantee that they employ a qualified worker.
quality.button: We are a legally operating Employment Agency registered in KRAZ under number 34778

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle1: We specialize in connecting employers with qualified workers from around the world. Our services include a full range of support - from recruitment to adaptation in a new workplace.
services.subtitle2: Our experts have been operating in the employment mediation market since 2017. Since then, we have successfully connected employees and employers in countries such as Poland, Lithuania, Germany and Sweden. Hundreds of workers from Asia, South America, and Eastern Europe have already trusted us.
services.service1_desc: Comprehensive recruitment of qualified workers from EU and non-EU countries. We check qualifications, experience and language skills.
services.service2_desc: Advanced AI platform connecting candidates with the perfect job based on skills, experience and preferences.
services.service2_item2: Database of thousands of current offers
services.service3_desc: Professional industry training, language courses and adaptation programs preparing for work in Europe.

employers.title: Services for Employers
employers.subtitle: Comprehensive HR Solutions for Companies
employers.foreign_delegation: WE SERVE FOREIGN ENTREPRENEURS DELEGATING EMPLOYEES TO WORK IN POLAND in the field of advisory services regarding residence and work legalization
employers.solution1_desc: We conduct the entire recruitment process - from acquiring candidates, through CV selection, job interviews, to presenting the employer with selected, best-matched people. This saves you time and gives you confidence that you receive candidates with appropriate qualifications and predispositions.
employers.solution2_desc: We handle the preparation and processing of all employment-related documents - from contracts, through ZUS registrations, to maintaining employee documentation and payroll settlements. We guarantee legality and employment security, also for foreign workers.
employers.solution3_desc: We offer professional consulting in employee selection, HR needs analysis and employment process optimization. We help build effective teams and support the development of your company's employer branding.
employers.solution4_title: Fast and flexible temporary worker employment
employers.solution4_desc: We provide the opportunity to quickly acquire workers for replacement, seasonal projects or emergency situations. Thanks to our extensive candidate database and efficient recruitment processes, we respond instantly to your current HR needs.
employers.solution5_title: Job offer promotion and employer image
employers.solution5_desc: We ensure effective promotion of your job offers on job portals, social media and industry communication channels. We support building a positive image of your company as an attractive employer in the job market.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most important questions about our services
faq.question1: What documents are needed to work in the EU?
faq.answer1: Basic documents include: passport, work permit or visa, health insurance, CV, and documents confirming qualifications. We will help you prepare complete documentation.
faq.question2: Do you offer help in finding accommodation?
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer comprehensive support in finding suitable accommodation. We cooperate with verified apartment owners in various European cities.
faq.question3: How much do agency services cost?
faq.answer3: For candidates, our basic recruitment services are free. Employers pay for comprehensive HR and recruitment services. We will provide detailed pricing information during consultation.
faq.question4: How long does the recruitment process take?
faq.answer4: The recruitment process usually takes 2 to 6 weeks, depending on the position and employer requirements. We inform about progress at every stage of the process.
faq.question5: Do you help with language learning?
faq.answer5: Yes, we offer European language courses (German, English, Dutch) and cultural adaptation programs that prepare for work in an international environment.
